header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Packing for a holiday, Clothes, Energy Bills, Eating, Muse, Football, E-Cigarettes, Plans for a weekend, Holiday Money, Taxis, A friend’s stag party, Airports, Reading, A friend visiting Germany, Plans for Christmas, The Scottish Referendum for Independence, Royal Family, Increasing cost rail travel, A friend’s cat
header.activity: Boyfriend and girlfriend chatting about a range of topics whilst watching football
